languages.text: {n}На лице рыжеволосого возникает бесноватая, дикая гримаса. Надтреснутый голос ревет:{/n} "Иди сюда, погань! Хватит прятаться там, за решеткой! Иди и повтори свои грязные слова, чтобы я мог запихнуть их обратно в твою порванную смердящую пасть!"

{n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"
languages.original_text: {n}На лице рыжеволосого возникает бесноватая, дикая гримаса. Надтреснутый голос ревет:{/n} "Иди сюда, погань! Хватит прятаться там, за решеткой! Иди и повтори свои грязные слова, чтобы я мог запихнуть их обратно в твою порванную смердящую пасть!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!" {n}He begins hammering on the bars with his fists, making them ring out in terrified protest.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!" {n}He begins hammering on the bars with his fists, making them ring out in terrified protest.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!" {n}He begins hammering on the bars with his fists, making them ring out in terrified protest.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}他的脸上浮现出了凶狠、狂暴的表情，以嘶哑的声音咆哮起来。{/n}“来啊，你这个卑鄙小人！你一直躲在铁栅栏的另一边，躲得已经够久了！到笼子里来，把你那些污言秽语再说一次，让我把那些话塞回你那张臭嘴里！”
languages.original_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他的脸上浮现出了凶狠、狂暴的表情，以嘶哑的声音咆哮起来。{/n}“来啊，你这个卑鄙小人！你一直躲在铁栅栏的另一边，躲得已经够久了！到笼子里来，把你那些污言秽语再说一次，让我把那些话塞回你那张臭嘴里！”{n}他开始用拳头捶打着铁栏杆，栏杆发出了惊恐的抗议声。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}野蛮で正気を失った表情が浮かぶ。彼はうなりながら厳しい口調で言った。{/n}「こっちへ来やがれ！檻に入っているからって調子に乗りやがって！言いたいことがあるなら入ってきて直接言え！その悪臭を放つ血濡れた口を塞いでやる！」
languages.original_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}野蛮で正気を失った表情が浮かぶ。彼はうなりながら厳しい口調で言った。{/n}「こっちへ来やがれ！檻に入っているからって調子に乗りやがって！言いたいことがあるなら入ってきて直接言え！その悪臭を放つ血濡れた口を塞いでやる！」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Una expresión salvaje y demente aflora en su rostro. Con voz áspera, gruñe:{/n} «¡Ven aquí, desgraciad{mf|o|a}! ¡Bastante te has escondido tras los barrotes! ¡Ven y repite esas idioteces para que te las haga tragar a patadas!».
languages.original_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una expresión salvaje y demente aflora en su rostro. Con voz áspera, gruñe:{/n} «¡Ven aquí, desgraciad{mf|o|a}! ¡Bastante te has escondido tras los barrotes! ¡Ven y repite esas idioteces para que te las haga tragar a patadas!». {n}Empieza a aporrear los barrotes, haciendo que tiemblen bajo su asalto.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Une expression sauvage, presque dérangée, lui déforme soudainement les traits. Il se met à grogner d'une voix rauque.{/n} « Venez, vermine ! Vous vous êtes {mf|caché|cachée} bien assez longtemps derrière ces barreaux ! Entrez donc et osez répéter ce que vous avez dit pour que je vous renvoie vos paroles nauséabondes dans la gueule ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une expression sauvage, presque dérangée, lui déforme soudainement les traits. Il se met à grogner d'une voix rauque.{/n} « Venez, vermine ! Vous vous êtes {mf|caché|cachée} bien assez longtemps derrière ces barreaux ! Entrez donc et osez répéter ce que vous avez dit pour que je vous renvoie vos paroles nauséabondes dans la gueule ! » {n}Il se met à marteler les barreaux avec ses poings, faisant trembler la structure qui proteste à grand bruit.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}In seinem Gesicht erscheint ein wilder, wahnhafter Ausdruck. Mit rauer Stimme knurrt er:{/n} "Kommt her, Wurm! Ihr habt Euch lange genug auf der anderen Seite des Gitters versteckt! Kommt rein und wiederholt Eure dreckigen Worte, damit ich sie in Euer blutiges, stinkendes Maul zurücktreten kann!"
languages.original_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}In seinem Gesicht erscheint ein wilder, wahnhafter Ausdruck. Mit rauer Stimme knurrt er:{/n} "Kommt her, Wurm! Ihr habt Euch lange genug auf der anderen Seite des Gitters versteckt! Kommt rein und wiederholt Eure dreckigen Worte, damit ich sie in Euer blutiges, stinkendes Maul zurücktreten kann!" {n}Er hämmert mit seinen Fäusten gegen die Stangen, bis sie in verängstigtem Protest zu knarzen beginnen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.original_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"

languages.text: {n}Delicesine yabani bir ifade, yüzüne oturuyor. Haşin bir ses tonuyla gürlüyor.{/n} "Gel buraya insan bozuntusu! Parmaklıkların diğer tarafında yeterince saklandın! Gel buraya da o lanet kelimeleri tekrar söyle bakalım. Sonra onları o kan içindeki kokuşmuş ağzına nasıl tıkıyorum gör."
languages.original_text: {n}A wild, deranged expression comes over his face. In a harsh voice, he growls,{/n} "Come here, you wretch! You have hidden on the other side of those bars long enough! Come in here and repeat your filthy words so I can kick them back into your bloodied, stinking muzzle!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Delicesine yabani bir ifade yüzüne oturuyor. Haşin bir ses tonuyla gürlüyor.{/n} "Gel buraya insan bozuntusu! Parmaklıkların diğer tarafında yeterince saklandın! Gel buraya da o lanet kelimeleri tekrar söyle bakalım. Sonra onları o kan içindeki kokuşmuş ağzına nasıl tıktığımı gör."
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
